item.title: Universal Notifications Using Telegram and cURL
item.description: If you ever wanted to get notified when certain things happen but didn’t find a lightweight solution – here comes captain Telegram. Using a simple Telegram bot, it’s possible to send notifications to your mobile phone or browser. All the notifier node needs is curl installed.
